title: Programming Practical Competency Enhancement: University Mathematics Pedagogy for Pre-Service Teachers Based on Extreme Apprenticeship

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary math concepts and foundational knowledge of elementary education methodologies
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can develop three or more instructional strategies for teaching elementary mathematics concepts (e.g., fractions, geometry) by applying the extreme apprenticeship model.
Learners can identify five types of student errors that may occur during VR simulation-based math lessons and propose improvement measures.
Learners can revise and enhance their instructional design two or more times based on peer and instructor feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
